ops.description: fadeScreen({r:12, g:60, b:60, speed:64, type:35}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:12, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:30}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Dyne
“I am definitely against it, no matter what.
There's nothing to talk about if you're
thinking of throwing away our coal!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Dyne
“The coal's been ours for generations.
Our fathers, and theirs before them,
risked their lives for it.”{PAUSE}“We have no right to throw it all
away so easily!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Dyne
“I know how you feel!
I feel the same way too, damn it!”{PAUSE}“But even so,
I won't give away our coal mines!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Barret}
“But listen, Dyne.
No one uses coal nowadays.
It's the sign of the times.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“Listen, Dyne.
I don't want my wife, Myrna,
to suffer anymore.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // That's how the Corel Reactor
was built…and completed.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // We all thought it would bring us an
easier life.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:1}); // Village Headman
“What are we going to do?
The only one opposed
to this is Dyne…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // Village Headman
“Dyne…you've got to understand.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // Scarlet
“Right, everything is Mako, now.”{PAUSE}“It'll be all right, Dyne.
Shinra, Inc. will guarantee your
livelihood once the Mako Reactor
is completed.”

dialogStrings:
Village Headman
“What are we going to do?
The only one opposed
to this is Dyne…”

Dyne
“I am definitely against it, no matter what.
There's nothing to talk about if you're
thinking of throwing away our coal!”

Dyne
“The coal's been ours for generations.
Our fathers, and theirs before them,
risked their lives for it.”{PAUSE}“We have no right to throw it all
away so easily!”

{Barret}
“But listen, Dyne.
No one uses coal nowadays.
It's the sign of the times.”

Scarlet
“Right, everything is Mako, now.”{PAUSE}“It'll be all right, Dyne.
Shinra, Inc. will guarantee your
livelihood once the Mako Reactor
is completed.”

{Barret}
“Listen, Dyne.
I don't want my wife, Myrna,
to suffer anymore.”

Dyne
“I know how you feel!
I feel the same way too, damn it!”{PAUSE}“But even so,
I won't give away our coal mines!”

That's how the Corel Reactor
was built…and completed.

We all thought it would bring us an
easier life.
